title: How to Cook Lamb Adobo

steps.headline: In a hot pot, put 2 teaspoon of oil (olive oil), then sauté the sliced onion and minced garlic, till the onion become caramelized and the garlic become golden brown.
Then add the lamb meat, Add 2 cups of water, soy sauce, vinegar, peppercorn and bay leaves, cover and simmer until the meat become tender.
Then add the potatoes, cover for  few minutes.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Then add the potatoes, cover and simmer until the potatoes become soft.

text: In a hot pot, put 2 teaspoon of oil (olive oil), then sauté the sliced onion and minced garlic, till the onion become caramelized and the garlic become golden brown.  Then add the lamb meat, Add 2 cups of water, soy sauce, vinegar, peppercorn and bay leaves, cover and simmer until the meat become tender.  Then add the potatoes, cover for  few minutes.  Add salt and pepper to taste.  Then add the potatoes, cover and simmer until the potatoes become soft.  Serve hot with a rice.
